description:
The XenServer virt driver now supports caching glance images locally as well as "fast-cloning" via cow images.

Both features are great, but add additional complexity and thus can make troubleshooting more difficult.

Because of this, it makes more sense for these to be opt-in, to ensure the Nova user is aware that caching and fast cloning are enabled, rather than having to disable it when things go wrong.
title: Make Glance Cache optimizations opt-in rather than opt-out
